alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 2:22PM PDT until August 21 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM PDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MERCED AND WESTERN FRESNO COUNTIES... At 221 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Dos Palos, or 28 miles south of Merced, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... South Dos Palos and Dos Palos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
